sub_title: International Revenue and Support Manager EMEA
summary:
As a professional in tourism with more as 20+ years of experience I like to create better business. Currently working in the Netherlands as an International Revenue and Support Manager EMEA for BWH Hotels.  I have experience working with different central reservations systems, property management systems, revenue management systems, channel manager systems, BI tools. 

I have been part of well known international companies in the tourism Industry, such as Tour Operator Thomas Cook, Lopesan Hotel Group, The Radisson Hotel Group, Accor, Hilton and currently BWH Hotels.  I started my career as a trainee on the Island Bonaire in the Carribean, where I discovered the attraction of the tourism Industry.

Working in different positions in the hospitality industry has given me the opportunity to understand how and where business creates value and profit.
